javadoc:
Property manager that deals with properties that are of
 a Saveable Object type and store within a database table.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct an Saveable object property map.

params.name: openMode
params.comment: the mode that the program was opened in.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: progress monitor that is only used when upgrading

throws.comment:
the map version is incompatible with
 the current Saveable object class version.  This will never be thrown
 if upgrade is true.
if the user cancels the upgrade operation.
if a database io error occurs.

methods.name: getSaveableClassForName
methods.comment:
Returns the class for the indicated class path name.
 If the class can't be determined,
 the GenericSaveable class is returned.

params.name: classPath
params.comment: the class path name of the desired class.

methods.name: checkMapVersion
methods.comment: Verify that the storage schema has not changed.

methods.name: upgradeTable
methods.comment:
Attempt to upgrade the map table records to the current schema.
 If unable to upgrade any of the map records, the table is removed.

return.comment:
true if all records were successfully upgrade.  A false
 value indicates that one or more entries were dropped.

methods.javadoc:
Create the necessary table(s) to support this property.
 Schema will vary depending upon Saveable object.
methods.name: createTable
methods.comment:
Create the necessary table(s) to support this property.
 Schema will vary depending upon Saveable object.

methods.name: upgradeMap
methods.comment: Attempt to upgrade the specified object map.

return.comment: upgraded map instance or null if unable to upgrade.

name: ObjectPropertyMapDB
comment:
Property manager that deals with properties that are of
 a Saveable Object type and store within a database table.
